Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights september 2011 solo traveller cost little annoying advertised taxes easytobookcom city tax added arrive looking hotels south damrak amsterdam prices average hotels basically amsterdam hotels comparison premier inn look hilton bit worried middle rld pleasantly surprised staff hotel location canals rld opposite rosso sex theatre rear hotel nice quiet location sights 5 mins dam sqaure centraal station 15 rembrantplein 30 leidseplein top 3rd floor 37 twin beds en suite shower air con tv nice deal key card hotel 24 hour bar downstairs closed doors nonresidents excellent feel lot safer stairs steep top floors carpets bit grubby threadbare changing bed ok comfort breakfast buffet served till 900am hot breakfast self service cold ham bread cheese jams etc coffee juice sets day fantastic staff pleasant helpfull travel tips etc decent budget hotel 1 2 night stay grab deal consider staying quick break
